title: Smart App-Based Medication Dose Calculation Competency Enhancement Program for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Theoretical knowledge of basic medication dosage calculations and mathematical fundamentals (fractions, ratios, unit conversions)
context.additional_context: Providing personalized feedback based on learner proficiency levels and applying additional support strategies when prior knowledge gaps exist

learning_goals: Learners can accurately calculate precise medication dosages (e.g., IV drip rates, weight-based doses) in various clinical scenarios with over 90% accuracy.
Learners can apply metacognitive strategies to diagnose and correct errors during calculation processes at least 80% of the time.
Learners can improve their flow (learning immersion) scores by at least 20% compared to pre-assessment after app-based training.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
